website_summaries.verdict: Choose this facial lotion if you like the idea of moisturizing and protecting your skin from the sun, all with one product you can use every day.
pros: A good choice for men who spend time in the sun, as it offers SPF 15
Contains aloe vera and vitamins that moisturize and nourish skin
Doesn't feel oily or heavy, and absorbs quickly
Brand is well-known for making quality skin care products
cons: Contains some potentially irritating ingredients, including alcohol and parabens
Mixed opinions on the scent – some find it refreshing, others think it's too strong

customer_reviews.author: Craig A Goleno

customer_reviews.title: This is my SPF body lotion
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily on my arms for the SPF. They make a good lotion - not heavy smell that overtakes you.

customer_reviews.title: Good face lotion for men
customer_reviews.text: Non-greasy, has a nice masculine scent that is not overbearing. I use this daily and it really makes a difference. The wind and cold can really sap your skin of moisture and this lotion helps restore it.
